file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 71-00-00-06 - POWERPLANT - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL POWERPLANT - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do a check on the powerplant for operation, after an engine removal/installation procedure. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 71-00-00-200-801-A ENGINE STATIC CHECKS EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 71-00-00 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 71-00-00-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ENGINE STATIC CHECKS A. General (1) This task gives the procedures which will permit you to do the checks on the powerplant for correct operation. (2) The procedures given here are applicable to the LH and RH engines. (3) The procedures given here are applicable to new or not new engines. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM MPP 78-30-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 12-12-01-600-801-A/300 ENGINE - SERVICING ENERGIZATION OF THE AIRCRAFT WITH AN EX- AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200 TERNAL POWER SOURCE AMM TASK 26-10-00-700-801-A/500 - AMM TASK 26-10-00-700-802-A/500 - DISCHARGE PIPING OF ENGINE FIRE EXTINGUISH- AMM TASK 26-21-06-200-801-A/600 ING SYSTEM - VISUAL INSPECTION AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - OPENING AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - CLOSING AMM TASK 71-51-01-200-801-A/600 ENGINE HARNESS - VISUAL INSPECTION AMM TASK 78-31-01-700-801-A/500 THRUST REVERSER - OPERATIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 LH Engine lower cowling 423 RH Engine lower cowling 223 Maintenance panel Cockpit D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 71-00-00 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit/Engine I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO MATERIAL. (1) Put the workstand in the work area. (2) Open the engine lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400). (3) Energize the aircraft with a DC Power Supply ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200). J. Engine Static Checks (Figure 601) SUBTASK 211-002-A CAUTION:MAKE SURE THAT THE ENGINE HARNESSES ARE CORRECTLY ATTACHED AND THERE IS NO CHAFING AGAINST THE ENGINE COMPONENTS, COWLINGS OR PYLON STRUCTURE. THIS CAN CAUSE SERIOUS PROBLEMS TO THE CORRECT ENGINE OPERATION. (1) Do a visual check on all electrical connectors and electrical power cables in the pylon to make sure that they are correctly installed and attached ( AMM TASK 71-51-01-200-801-A/600). If necessary, correct. (2) Do a visual check in the hydraulic hoses for correct installation and security. If necessary, correct. (3) Do a check on the thrust reverser hydraulic hoses to make sure that they are correctly installed and attached. If necessary, correct. (4) Do a visual check on the fire extinguishing tubing, in the engine ( AMM TASK 26-21-06-200-801-A/600). CAUTION: MAKE SURE THAT THERE IS FUEL IN THE AIRCRAFT FUEL TANKS TO PREVENT DAMAGE TO THE FUEL PUMPS. (5) Start the electrical fuel pump and examine the engine fuel-feed line connection from the pylon to the FPMU for leakage. If necessary, correct. (6) Stop the electrical fuel pump. WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 78-30-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO MATERIAL. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 71-00-00 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (7) If applicable, do an operational check on the thrust reverser for correct operation ( AMM TASK 78-31-01-700-801-A/500). If necessary, correct. (8) Do an operational check on the Fire Detection System (AMM TASK 26-10-00-700-801- A/500) or (AMM TASK 26-10-00-700-802-A/500) as applicable. (9) Do a check on the engine oil level. Fill as necessary (AMM TASK 12-12-01-600-801-A/ 300). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the engine lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the workstand from the work area. (3) Deenergize the aircraft ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200).
